description: Avoid fixed-width layouts that prevent content from resizing or wrapping at smaller viewports.
recommendation: Prefer percentage, auto, or flexible sizing instead of fixed pixel widths so layouts adapt at 320px width or 400% zoom. (WCAG 2.1 SC 1.4.10)
algorithm: Flags fixed width/min-width usage in inline styles or width attributes, plus XAML Width/MinWidth numeric values that prevent reflow.
algorithm_advanced: Flags inline style width/min-width with fixed units, width attributes with fixed units, and XAML Width/MinWidth numeric values.
